backend/main.mo: Defines types and maps for job roles, employees, leaves, contact messages, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations and system initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing layouts, pages, components, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and protected HR dashboard pages with authentication guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with login and home navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog for new authenticated users to submit name and email to create their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wraps protected content, showing a loader during init or an access denied screen if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A form for sending contact messages with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactM: Renders a sorted list of contact messages with metadata and read status.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactS: Displays a contact section with animated form and contact info blocks.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Form for creating or updating employee details including salary and joining date.
Displays a table of employees with key details and navigation to each profile.
frontend/src/components/jobroles/JobRole: Form component to create a job role, handling validation, LinkedIn URL checks, and triggering a create mutation.
Displays a table of job roles with title, location, status, and a link to the LinkedIn posting.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipCard.t: Renders a card showing a leadership member's name, title, and description with an icon.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveEntr: Panel showing an employee’s leave entries, total leaves taken, and a dialog for adding new entries.
Form for adding a leave entry with date validation and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Defines the public site layout with header navigation, mobile menu, smooth section scrolling, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalaryBre: Card component that displays calculated salary breakdown values for an employee.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Displays a service card with icon, title, description, and a list of key features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to track whether an element is in view with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, employees, job roles, and leave entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and global CSS variables, themes, and base styles including dark mode and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company mission, values, and leadership information using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays the Contact page layout and embeds the ContactSection component with business hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with sections, feature listings, hash-based scrolling, and open job roles count.
frontend/src/pages/hr/ContactMessagesPag: Displays all contact form messages, showing a loading skeleton or fallback when empty, and renders a message list when data is available.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeeDetailPage: Shows detailed employee information with tabs for overview, leaves, and editing, handling loading and missing-employee states.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeesPage.tsx: Lists all employees with search filtering, loading skeletons, and a dialog for adding new employees.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrLayout.tsx: Provides the HR dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/hr/JobRolesPage.tsx: Displays active job roles with loading states and a dialog to create new job postings.
frontend/src/pages/RecruitmentPage.tsx: Shows open job roles with loading skeletons, job cards, and LinkedIn links using data from React Query.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists HR-related services and features, rendering each through the ServiceCard component.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency and timestamps into user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/salary.ts: Calculates a salary breakdown including base pay, bonus, deductions, and final payable amount.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides smooth scrolling to sections and maps route paths to section IDs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins for a themed UI with container queries and typography.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing website requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for an HR consulting site.
